```{r create-map-one}
#map displaying all capture locations for all otters in study
map1 <- leaflet(data = seot) %>%
  addTiles () %>%
  setView(lng = 179,
          lat = 51,
          zoom = 5) %>%
  addCircleMarkers(lng = ~ LONG, lat = ~ LAT, popup = seot$OTTER.NO,
                   clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
```
